name: Telley
description:
Iyobi is running away from Telley in the living room to keep all the score to herself. When Telley gets closer to Iyobi, her score decreases. Try not to loose all your score until the time's up... and Beware of the carpets!

Use or arrow keys to move Iyobi around the room and run away from Telley...

Game Development Journal
https://merthurturk.com/telley-devlog
